name: Bad machinima
description:
This game is nothing special. If you can, play it! Thanks!

This game still is being updated. Is very very veeery early version!

HOW TO PLAY:

Blue player-wsad

Pink player-arrows

Open doors-space

Delete block- rmb.

Place block- + in numeric keyboard

Create doors 1-num1

Create doors 2-num2

Turret shooting-enter
